forecast.name: Overnight
forecast.detailedForecast: Partly cloudy, with a low around 53. West wind around 18 mph, with gusts as high as 23 mph.

forecast.name: Friday
forecast.detailedForecast: Sunny. High near 64, with temperatures falling to around 62 in the afternoon. West wind 17 to 22 mph, with gusts as high as 28 mph.

weather_report:
As the night envelops Downtown San Francisco, the cityscape lies under a soft layer of partly cloudy skies, with temperatures settling around a brisk 53 degrees. The west wind whispers through the streets, a steady 18 mph breeze punctuated by occasional gusts, bringing the refreshing touch of a coastal night. The streets may be dark now, but the dawn promises a different story. 

With the sun’s ascent on the horizon, Friday unveils itself in radiant glory. A bright sun will cast its warm embrace, raising temperatures to a gentle 64 degrees, and as the afternoon wanes, expect a gradual cooling to around 62. The wind, ever-present, strengthens to a playful dance of 17 to 22 mph, echoing the sea’s proximity. The likelihood of fog seems to linger at a distance, but the overall clarity enhances the striking views of the Golden Gate and beyond, presenting an idyllic opportunity for exploration. Dressed in layers—a light sweater or jacket will serve well against the chill of the morning and evening. As the day unfolds, take a stroll along the waterfront or find solace in one of the quaint cafes that dot the city, basking in the warmth of coffee while the world outside settles into a vibrant Friday rhythm.
